title: Танец для двоих
overview: Lera is happily married, raising her son Nikita and teaching dance at the best studio in the city. Her son also studies there. Lera is proud of him and prepares him for a dance competition. But one day Nikita decides to go skateboarding, flies out onto the road and breaks his leg. And then he tells his mother that he was hit by a man with a car. Lera decides to find and punish the culprit at all costs. To top it all off, her husband Andrey tells her about her divorce, he started an affair with his boss and leaves the family. Meanwhile, Angela decides to learn a wedding dance, brings her fiancé Ilya to Lera's studio and makes him learn to dance. Lera soon falls in love with her new student and does not suspect that he is the very person she is looking for.
